titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I preached at the Church Parade: attended Mattins & heard an admirable sermon from Cruickshank: celebrated the Holy Communion: and preached the terminal sermon of the Durham Inter–collegiate Christian Union in Hatfield Hall Chapel. There were 17 male students, and as many female with Jevons, Pace, & M
came in to tea, & had some talk with me.
& his wife were at lunch; also Miss Cooper. Then I wrote letters, & so brought to an end a Sunday which was at once busy & futile!
